title: Create interactive game application

requirements.text: Create a playable game with interactive gameplay mechanics that responds to user input
acceptanceCriteria: Game has clear win/loss conditions or scoring system
User can interact with the game through keyboard or mouse controls
Game state updates in real-time based on user actions
Game can be started, played, and restarted

requirements.text: Design a distinctive visual theme with cohesive colors, typography, and layout that creates an engaging gaming atmosphere
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design uses a consistent color palette throughout the game interface
Typography choices enhance readability and match the game's theme
Layout provides clear visual hierarchy for game elements and UI controls
Overall aesthetic creates an immersive gaming experience

requirements.text: Implement score tracking and persistence so players can see their current score and high scores are saved between sessions
acceptanceCriteria: Current score is displayed during gameplay
High score is persisted in the backend and retrieved on game load
Score updates correctly based on game events
High score is updated when current score exceeds it

requirements.text: Render generated game assets including background images, character sprites, or game element graphics as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are properly referenced and displayed in the game interface
Image assets load correctly without backend routing

constraints: Use React with TypeScript for frontend implementation
Use Motoko for backend implementation in single-actor architecture
All backend logic must reside in the main actor file
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor, main.tsx, and ui components
Use React Query for state management
nonGoals: Integration with external game engines or frameworks beyond Three.js/React Three Fiber

required: Game background with dynamic gradient or abstract pattern (game-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
Player character or game piece sprite illustration (player-sprite.dim_128x128.png)
